entry.title: 🎯 Master of Markdown - Debunking the Parsing Issue in GitHub Pages

link.title: 🎯 Master of Markdown - Debunking the Parsing Issue in GitHub Pages

entry.summary: 📺 Context You keep a GitHub repository for documentation purpose. All the documents are written in Markdown1 syntax. You activate GitHub Pages2 to turn the repo into a nice little website (cause you’re don’t prefer reinventing the wheel). The site is published, and out of the blue, beautiful markdown text formattings are breaking up! 🤦‍♂️ Googling and going through stack overflow th...
